name: Advanced_Pixel_Sorter
description: An advanced pixel sorting effect designed to achieve a waterfall-like effect by manipulating pixels based on lightness, hue, and other parameters.

paramDescriptions.threshold_min: Controls the minimum pixel brightness for sorting.
paramDescriptions.threshold_max: Controls the maximum pixel brightness for sorting.
paramDescriptions.sorting_direction: Sets the sorting direction: 0 for vertical, 1 for horizontal.
paramDescriptions.sorting_style: Sort based on: 0 = Hue, 1 = Saturation, 2 = Lightness.
